channel.title: Writeup on Policy to Packets
channel.description: Recent content in Writeup on Policy to Packets

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - Shellshock Attack
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing Shellshock attack activity in a PCAP file using Wireshark, identifying the target server details and the injected command from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - Port Scan Activity
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing port scan activity in a PCAP file using Wireshark, identifying the scanning host, discovered systems, and network indicators from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - MSHTML
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: In-depth LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing malicious Office documents exploiting MSHTML (CVE-2021-40444), using oletools to extract indicators, identify malicious domains and IPs, and investigate document-based exploitation from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] HackTheBox Labs - Challenge - OnlyHacks
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step HackTheBox “OnlyHacks” challenge writeup demonstrating cross-site scripting (XSS) exploitation, session cookie theft, and practical web application enumeration in a Very Easy web challenge.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - Excel 4.0 Macros
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing a malicious Excel 4.0 (XLM) macro document using XLMMacroDeobfuscator and oletools to identify process execution, regsvr32 abuse, and DLL payload behavior.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - Malicious Doc
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing a malicious Word document using VirusTotal to identify RTF exploit behavior, CVE-2017-11882 abuse, payload delivery, and network communication from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - Remote Working
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing a malicious XLS file using VirusTotal to identify detection signatures, dropped files, spyware download URLs, and file intelligence indicators from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - Malicious VBA
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing a malicious VBA macro document, decoding obfuscated hex strings, identifying payload delivery, and investigating HTTP communication and WMI execution techniques from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - Learn Sigma
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing a Sigma rule for detecting bitsadmin.exe abuse, explaining rule structure, detection logic, and ransomware-related process_creation monitoring from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] HackTheBox Labs - Challenge - Slippy
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step HackTheBox “Slippy” challenge writeup demonstrating Zip Slip exploitation, Jinja2 SSTI abuse, and Flask-based web application compromise within a Docker environment.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC104 - Malware Detected - EventID 84
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC104 alert writeup investigating a malware detection event (EventID 84), validating the WinRAR installer hash using VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, reviewing SIEM logs, and determining a false positive from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC282 - Phishing Alert - Deceptive Mail Detected - EventID 257
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC282 phishing alert writeup investigating a deceptive email (EventID 257), analyzing a malicious ZIP attachment in VirusTotal, identifying C2 communication, correlating SIEM logs, and initiating endpoint containment from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC145 - Ransomware Detected - EventID 92
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC145 ransomware alert writeup investigating a true positive malware detection (EventID 92), validating Avaddon ransomware via VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, identifying EDR removal, and initiating endpoint containment from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC109 - Emotet Malware Detected - EventID 85
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC109 alert writeup investigating an Emotet malware detection (EventID 85), validating the hash in VirusTotal, reviewing SIEM and endpoint logs, and confirming a true positive successfully quarantined by EDR.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC104 - Malware Detected - EventID 36
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC104 alert writeup investigating a malware detection (EventID 36), confirming Maze ransomware via VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, identifying C2 communication, and executing containment from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC119 - Proxy - Malicious Executable File Detected - EventID 83
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC119 proxy alert writeup investigating a malicious executable detection (EventID 83), validating URL, domain, and IP reputation using VirusTotal and log analysis, and determining a false positive from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC104 - Malware Detected - EventID 14
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC alert writeup analyzing a malware detection event (EventID 14), validating file reputation in VirusTotal, reviewing endpoint and log data, and determining a false positive from a SOC analyst perspective.
